INSERT ALL
INTO MSSAPP.MC_RM_AC_INSTR_LNDRAT (RM_AC_INSTR_LNDRAT_ID, AC_ID, INSTR_ID, IS_ACTV, AC_LNDRAT, REMRK, VER_STAT, REC_VER_NUM, INIT_TIME, LAST_UPD_TIME, LAST_UPD_BY, TAG_SEQ) VALUES (#{item.rmAcInstrLndratId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.acId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.instrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.isActv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.acLndrat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.remrk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.verStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.recVerNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.initTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastUpdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastUpdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tagSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT})
SELECT 1 FROM DUAL
